text: Deon Jackson (January 26, 1946 - April 19, 2014) was an American soul singer, songwriter and educator. His best known songs were "Love Makes the World Go Round" (1966), "Love Takes a Long Time Growing" (1966) and "Ooh Baby" (1967). He was born Ann Arbor, Michigan. Jackson died on April 19, 2014 at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Deon Jackson at All Music Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:African-American musicians Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American soul musicians Category:Singers from Illinois Category:Singers from Michigan
title: Deon Jackson
